title: Sky's Soccer Saturday squad players given chance to shine in rare day off for Jeff Stelling
text:
So farewell, then: Marvin the Paranoid Android, or rather the human who voiced him on the radio and TV. Stephen Moore, the Hitchhiker’s Guide to the Galaxy actor who has died aged 81, will be remembered for his work as the depressed robot in the Douglas Adams masterpiece, as Marvin dolefully intoned observations like: “Life: loathe it or ignore it, you can’t like it.”

Blessed with “a brain the size of a planet” but given mundane tasks or simply left unattended for millions of years, railing against crushing, outrageous futility: such was Marvin’s stock in trade. And what a familiar existential sense that is to any football fan over an international weekend. England had their match on Friday night...
